last_episode_to_air.name: Taye Diggs
last_episode_to_air.overview: Actor Taye Diggs returns with Kim to a New York City theater to investigate a paranormal encounter he experienced years ago; they discover that the night of Taye's haunting is a crucial piece in a puzzle that he has always struggled to put together.

name: Celebrity Ghost Stories
overview: Psychic-medium Kim Russo brings some of the biggest names in entertainment back to the sites of their previous paranormal experiences for an unfiltered, emotional, and sometimes terrifying reunion with the ghosts of their past.
